document.full_text: britain's graeme mcdowell is hoping a second straight wales open success at celtic manor this week will propel him toward a second successive victory in the u.s. open.
document.title: inspired mcdowell again looking for kick-start in wales
lines_and_colors: britain's graeme mcdowell is hoping a second straight wales open success at celtic manor this week will propel him toward a second successive victory in the u.s. open.
